Module org.monarchinitiative.phenol.core

Package org.monarchinitiative.phenol.ontology.algo

package org.monarchinitiative.phenol.ontology.algo
Miscellaneous algorithms on ontologies.
Author:
Manuel Holtgrewe
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    InformationContentComputation
    Utility class for computing information content of Term (identified by their TermIds) in an Ontology.
    OntologyAlgorithm
    Implementation of several commonly needed algorithms for traversing and searching in and Ontology.
    OntologyTerms
    Deprecated, for removal: This API element is subject to removal in a future version.
    use OntologyGraph methods instead.
    ShortestPathTable
    Shortest path table for Ontology objects.
